attributes.review: I was so excited to download the app. I wanted to know what the Trump campaign was up to. I was saddened to discover all the racist, homophobic, sexist, etc. things that Bunker baby stands for. The app took awfully long to download which I also hated. AND NOT JUST THAT, IT LAGS SO BAD. I also fear that bunker baby might be stealing my information and selling it. So to whoever reads this please do not be fooled, this app is the worst thing to ever exist. Spare yourself from the suffering.
attributes.title: Awful app
